sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_GET.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT m_users.user_id, m_users.user_fname, m_users.user_mobile, m_users.user_email, m_users.cap_amt, m_users.balance_amt, m_users.balance_outstanding, m_users.aeps_limit, m_users.aeps_balance, mut.type_name, m_users.user_type, m_users.aadhar_no, m_users.pan_no, m_users.address, m_users.pin, m_users.state, m_users.district, m_users.kyc_status, m_users.aeps_merchant_id, tuk.profile_pic, tuk.pan_card, tuk.aadhar_front, tuk.aadhar_back, m_users.scheme_id AS schid
FROM m_users AS m_users
LEFT JOIN m_user_type AS mut ON (mut.id = m_users.user_type) LEFT JOIN t_user_kyc AS tuk ON (tuk.user_id = m_users.id)
WHERE m_users.id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT t_service_scheme_control.service_id, t_service_scheme_control.status
FROM t_service_scheme_control
LEFT JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.scheme_id = t_service_scheme_control.scheme_id)
WHERE mu.id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */
ORDER BY t_service_scheme_control.service_id ASC

SELECT api_code
FROM m_api
WHERE status = 1 AND api_type = :P1 /* {{'DMT'}} */
SELECT new_balance as opening_balance FROM tt_balance WHERE user_id=@id AND tr_date::date < now()::date ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT new_balance as closing_balance FROM tt_balance WHERE user_id = @id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
